echoes.name: Lorelei
echoes.description: A mysterious echo that takes the form of a woman in a blue hood, said to guide lost souls through the darkness.

effects.4piece: After using a Forte Skill, increases CRIT Rate by 12% for 8s

echoes.name: Nightmare: Crownless
echoes.description: An echo born from the nightmares of a fallen ruler, forever seeking its lost crown.

effects.4piece: After using a Basic Attack, increases ATK by 14% for 6s, stacks up to 3 times

echoes.name: Dreamless
echoes.description: An echo that exists in a state between waking and sleeping, unable to dream or fully awaken.

effects.4piece: After using a Forte Skill, the next Basic Attack deals 40% additional DMG

echoes.name: Crownless
echoes.description: A lesser version of the Nightmare: Crownless echo, still seeking its lost crown.

effects.4piece: After using a Basic Attack, increases ATK by 10% for 6s, stacks up to 2 times

echoes.name: Phantom: Capitaneus
echoes.description: An echo of an ancient captain who still sails the seas between worlds, searching for a port that no longer exists.

effects.4piece: When HP is above 80%, increases CRIT Rate by 15%

echoes.name: Nightmare: Lampylumen Myriad
echoes.description: An echo formed from countless tiny lights, resembling a swarm of luminescent creatures that dance in perfect harmony.

effects.4piece: After using a Forte Skill, the next Basic Attack has a 70% chance to deal 60% additional Electro DMG

echoes.name: Phantom: Luminous
echoes.description: An echo that shines with an inner light, illuminating the darkness around it.

effects.4piece: After using a Forte Skill, increases Energy Regen by 25% for 8s

echoes.name: Nightmare: Frost Monarch
echoes.description: An echo born from the frozen dreams of a winter king, eternally seeking warmth.

effects.4piece: When HP is above 70%, increases CRIT DMG by 25%

echoes.name: Windchaser
echoes.description: An echo that follows the wind, always moving and never staying in one place for long.

echoes.name: Thunderstrike
echoes.description: An echo that crackles with electric energy, ready to strike at any moment.

effects.4piece: After using a Basic Attack, has a 30% chance to deal 25% additional Electro DMG
